General.Name: Hubei Jiuzhiyang Infrared System Co Ltd
General.Description: Hubei Jiuzhiyang Infrared System Co., Ltd engages in the research, production, and marketing of infrared thermal imagers in China. The company offers uncooled and cooled infrared imagers; laser range finders; and hand-held and physical thermoscopes. Its products are used in the areas of marine surveillance, law enforcement, security and protection monitoring, forest fire prevention, supervising and rescue for aquatic transportation, search and rescue, industrial detection, inspection and quarantine, assistant driving, etc. The company is based in Wuhan, China.

1.Name: Ms. Lei  Lu
1.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Sec. of the Board of Directors
